instructions: Cut meat into bite sized pieces and marinate in soy sauce, mirin, and baking soda. Mince the garlic, ginger, and white part of green onion and set aside. Then mix together remaining ingredients to make the sauce. Put meat into medium hot pan and let sit until browned on the bottom. Add garlic, ginger, and green onion and cook until meat is cooked through. Then add sauce and cook until thickened. Garnish with tops of green onion. Serve with stir fried vegetables and rice.
name: Gochujang Stir Fry
ingredients: 1.5 tsp Red Pepper Flakes or Paprika
